machine.noActiveSession: No active session. Start using this resource by clicking the button below.
machine.sessionStartedDescription: You have successfully started using this resource.
machine.sessionTakeOvernDescription: You have successfully takeovern the session.
machine.sessionTakeOverErrorDescription: Failed to takeover the session. The other user might have ended their session, or an error occurred.

generic.title: Failed to Start Session
generic.description: An error occurred while starting the session: {{error}}

INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.title: Insufficient Balance
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.description: You do not have enough credits to start the session. Please add more credits.

startWithNotes.label: Start with Notes
startWithNotes.description: Start the session and provide notes.

generic.title: Failed to Control Door
generic.description: An error occurred while controlling the door. Please try again.
